page.title: 06A Weekend in my Life
page.content: One weekend we were asked to write down the main things we did each hour. This is my weekend. On Saturday I slept for 10hrs, but on Sunday I slept for 12hrs. On Saturday I helped my mum, and that took one hour, but on Sunday I didn't because I was ill. On Saturday I had two main meals that lasted 2 hours, but on Sunday I had a snack meal. On Sunday my sister was home so I could play with her. There was no gym on Sunday, but I spent three hours doing gumnastics on the Saturday. Thus on Saturday I slept for 46% of the day, and spent 8.3% of the day eating. I played by myself when my sister was out playing with her friend. The other things I did was to watch television and wash myself. Joanna Rutherford Age 9
